meaningMnemonic: You have to <kanji>pierce</kanji> this piece of information into your brain until it finally <kanji>penetrate</kanji>s, which takes a lot of <vocabulary>persistence</vocabulary>. Do that and it will be quite the <vocabulary>accomplishment</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
